Blog.post: No one can beat me your life aint as screwed as mine i've been thru much pain n sorrow tho' i always seem just fine No one can beat me my problems arise day after day im tryin' my best to solve them some cant seem to pass away No one can beat me i've a discouraged heart life's a major struggle but i'll just do my part yes melvin. mine's more screwed up. -life's screwed andrew up-

hey you. sittin' there in your underwear watchin' tv. get up. move your ass. cos we gonna do smth that will change the world. n i mean .. change this world. this world thats been destroyed beyond recognition. this world that exists as some screwed up place for equally screwed up ppl like each one for us. yes. us. me n you n you n you.. n you too. now watch out everyone. keep on the look out, cos it's hydrostrike time! - the man who will do anything to change the world -
Yes. I need it. I should be studying now. Tmr's common test. wow. What has happened to me.? I need smth to push me to study. Blogging is borrring. I'm borrring. hmm that explains wad i'm doing...

Father Lord hear my cry I can't seem to get things right As I look to You I feel so dry Help me Lord to see Your light As I trod this journey on Earth Lord make me realise the wrong I've done Let me know my every worth Remind me that I am Your son O Lord since You've chosen me I will never let You down A faithful child I will be Lord give me strength to last the rounds andrew.

Lord You seem so far away A million miles or more it feels today And Though I haven't lost my faith I must confess right now, that it's hard for me to pray * But I don't know what to say And I don't know where to start But as You give the grace With all that's in my heart ** I will sing, I will praise Even in my darkest hour Through the sorrow and the pain I will sing, I will praise Lift my hands to honour You Because Your Word is true I will sing Lord it's hard for me to see All the thoughts and plans You have for me But I will put my trust in You Knowing that You died to set me free * **

As I am trapped in this shadow of darkness Filled with anxiety not knowing what to do Lord please show me Your mighty prowess Give me strength and carry me through Many a time I feel like giving up Just letting go and never returning But Lord I pray You'll fill my cup Quench my thirst keep my heart burning And even in my darkest hour I'll remain as firm as can be Lord give unto me Your great power That I may stand by You eternally andrew.

Hide me now, Under your wings Cover me, Within Your mighty hand When the oceans rise and thunders roar I will soar with You above the storm Father You are King over the flood I will be still know you are God "When I cried out, He answered me, and made me bold with strength in my soul." Psalm 138:3
As we live the days of our lives Live with a purpose, with the end in mind Never give up, just keep on tryin' 'Cos we are the branches, He is the vine

RJC - double champs! we did it pple we deserved it I wanna thank everyone in the team cos every one played a part this yr be it big or small we did it as a team things didnt go smoothly for us but we showed great determination its a great success for both the guys n the girls congrats rafflesians! we did the school proud! and, we'll be back next yr for more ....

After numerous gruelling battles its come down to the final stretch we must never think of giving up whatever they obtain we will match may we achieve what we deserve which is the championship, hopefully lets go raffles, the time is ours Auspicium Melioris Aevi` -fight-

walao! i didnt qualify for 110h either! its my worst year ever. how was i to noe that my heat was so slow?! i thot if i stayed behind marcus n joseph i would qualify! i mean .. 3rd in the heat .. n only 2 heats .. n top 8 timings qualify.. average would be 4 per heat rite? but noo.. it was only 2 frm my heat n 6 frm the other! im damn pissed.. if only i knew.. i would've run faster! nvm blame it on myself. i didnt train enough to get the feel of wad a good timing would feel like. im sorry ppl.. i screwed this yr up.. i hope nothing goes wrong.. if not i'd have to take the blame. -i didnt want it badly enough-

i whacked the bloody last one again. i juz cant believe it. i told myself i had to cross it. i juz didnt have the energy. i blame it upon myself. i didnt train for the whole of june. i had a freaking hamstring pull. i know i deserved this. i juz cant believe that its happened for 2 consecutive years. i am confused. i suck. sorry to all whom i've pissed off becos of my foul mood. pls understand. sorry again. really.

i dunno wads wrong wif u. start shouting at me for no apparent reason u claim. im stressed enough wif nationals. i cant take all this now. if you're gonna continue doing this then juz give me a break n let me suffer myself for now. n the rest of u give me a break too. leave me alone to focus n rot away. i juz hope to live yet another day. -we will win. we must win-

Nationals officially starts tmr. excited?? Rjc's gonna win.. gonna whip everyone's asses.. Every school is afraid of us we have no fear We'll fight all the way till the end draws near Even if we fail we wun argue cry or moan Cos we'll be back with a vengeance the losers go home. Bye.

You are the God above all gods You are the Way above all ways Your mercy Your wisdom Your grace Sustains me in all that i face Your power Your strength and Your might Gives me courage to stand up and fight And proclaim You are Lord For You are great You do miracles so great And there is no one else like You

Im living in a state of confusion Lost in a world i never was in Lord please knock some sense into me Help me see what a loser i've been I shldn't be doing all these things I shldn't be wasting my life I know what i have to do I know i must learn to strive Lord You are Holy Lord You reign on High All i need is You Lord work in my life -Life is short. Do what you need to do. Do not regret- andrew.

aight. common test over. flunked. horribly. i want DECO. as in grades D,E,C n O. bleah. i suck. actually, deco's a great player. in case u dunno, he's the handsome midfielder playing for portugal. well maybe not so handsome but yea he's that midfielder. i want greece to win euro. i want ppl to lose more money. hahaha. having 2nd thoughts abt betting on portugal now? heh.. spiderman 2's darn nice. the storyline n the visual effects are good. they fit perfectly. go watch it. ok track nationals in 2+ wks. im screwed. hamstring still slightly injured. dun even noe if i can recover in time for nats. havent been training at all for most of june hols. how screwed can this be? its my most unprepared yr for nats. arghh~ we'll juz see how things go.. we need understanding, and trust. and everything will turn out fine. -she said it too many times before. dang.-

Committing my life, my all to You I dont wanna do this all alone Indeed You'll be there when i call To me You'd make Your presence known Trials and temptations i may face I'll offer them all up to You Take my burdens away from me That I may always start anew Days are numbered as they go by Destruction is widespread, people die Save us from this sinful world Show us Your mercy, hear our cry andrew.

I'll never know how much it costs To see my sin upon that cross Here I am to worship Here I am to bow down Here I am to say that You're my God Even when things are looking blue I'll never hesitate to look to You Cos' I know You'll be there for me To strengthen me and pull me thru' asean schools sounded damn fun when i heard frm the ppl who went. too bad im so lousy i cant even smell the airplane exhaust when it takes off. i feel like im wasting my time in school. in track. i wanna move on. but where to..? dang.
national day holiday. i shld study. i need to study. i need discipline. bah... i keep thinking of playing.. argh~
something's amiss. just that thing. i want.
